title: GRAPENT Wide Leg Jeans for Women Trendy High Waisted Straight Leg Cropped Stretchy Denim Pants with Retro Patch Pockets
description: Play with Chic : Jeans Inseam:26''. Embrace the high-waisted, straight-leg silhouette with our Wide Leg Jeans Woman, offering a chic and playful look that accentuates your frame with a fun, retro vibe
70s Revival: Step into the era of retro charm with our Womens High Waisted Jeans, complete with iconic patch pockets, offering a comfortable and stylish throwback that's sure to make a statement

Comfort Meets Flexibility: Our Womens Jeans Straight Leg, crafted from our exclusive Slight Stretch Denim, provide the optimal combination of durability and flexibility, ensuring a superior fit that moves with you effortlessly

Multi-occasion: These Womens Stretchy Jeans are great for casual daily work wear, business casual, office, shopping, travels, vacations and so on; easy to match well with tops, vests, blouses, shirts, coats or blazers in any seasons

Multi-size: Our Dark Wash Jeans Women run true to standard US sizes; size Small fits size 4 to size 6, size Medium fits size 8 to size 10, size Large fits size 12 to size 14, size X-Large fits size 16 to size 18, size XX-Large fits size 20 to size 22
